communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: NYPD Police / Freeman / Fusus
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

Records of any email sent or received by NYPD containing the term "Fusus" from the sender/recipient Marshall Freeman, Chief (formerly deputy chief) Administrative Officer of the Atlanta Police Department, and Fusus investor for the period beginning January 1, 2023, and continuing through July 18, 2025. Emails to search for include "mafreeman@atlantaga.gov" "mbf@fusus.com" or "marshallfreeman@gmail.com". 

Thank you in advance for your timely compliance! 

Andrew Free

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Andrew Free

communications.subject: NYC.gov - NYC.ID Confirm Your Email Address
communications.communication:
You have just created a user account with City of New York. If it was created in error, deactivate your account. (https://www1.nyc.gov/account/deactivate.htm?guid=8a6b00e676204af1a2d26e2176aea045&token=sHeyPRgQaonhCfQmJkVUAiphoAsATCbaxrowVRkUBNpXMBgFtkdnnrPhHXyiUHrY&target=aHR0cHM6Ly9hODYwLW9wZW5yZWNvcmRzLm55Yy5nb3Yv) to confirm your email address. (https://www1.nyc.gov/account/validateToken.htm?guid=8a6b00e676204af1a2d26e2176aea045&token=sHeyPRgQaonhCfQmJkVUAiphoAsATCbaxrowVRkUBNpXMBgFtkdnnrPhHXyiUHrY&target=aHR0cHM6Ly9hODYwLW9wZW5yZWNvcmRzLm55Yy5nb3Yv&spName=OpenRecordsPRD) Click this link 
If the above link does not work, paste the following address into your browser: https://www1.nyc.gov/account/validateToken.htm?guid=8a6b00e676204af1a2d26e2176aea045&token=sHeyPRgQaonhCfQmJkVUAiphoAsATCbaxrowVRkUBNpXMBgFtkdnnrPhHXyiUHrY&target=aHR0cHM6Ly9hODYwLW9wZW5yZWNvcmRzLm55Yy5nb3Yv&spName=OpenRecordsPRD (https://www1.nyc.gov/account/validateToken.htm?guid=8a6b00e676204af1a2d26e2176aea045&token=sHeyPRgQaonhCfQmJkVUAiphoAsATCbaxrowVRkUBNpXMBgFtkdnnrPhHXyiUHrY&target=aHR0cHM6Ly9hODYwLW9wZW5yZWNvcmRzLm55Yy5nb3Yv&spName=OpenRecordsPRD) 
We ask you to confirm your email to ensure our emails will be delivered. This is the address you will log in with, and the address to which we will deliver all email messages regarding invitations and requests, and other system mail. 
You can change your email address at any time, but will only be able to log in with it once you have confirmed the email address by clicking the link. 
Thank you for using NYC.gov. 
Do Not Reply - Automatic Email
